nodes.documentation:
This contract will take charge of submitting base hash value to blockchain
it will be inherited by other hash operating contracts
nodes.name: DRCHashBase

nodes.documentation: @dev set the memo to describe the objective of the contract
nodes.name: setMemo

insertHash

addTxIdForOnchainData(string,string).details: add Tx hash for the hash string uploaded to blockchain

params._txHash: is the Tx hash value generated by action of inserting hash

addTxIdForOnchainData(string,string).return: bool,true is successful and false is failed

deleteHash(string).return: bool,true is successful and false is failed

getHashByTxId(string).details: get inserted hash string by the Tx hash

params._txHash: is input value of Tx hash

getHashByTxId(string).return: is the hash string corresponding to the Tx hash

getInsertedHashGroup(uint256[]).details: get a group of Tx hashs for the hash strings uploaded to blockchain

params._indices: is array of the index of the Tx hash group

getInsertedHashGroup(uint256[]).return: is the Tx hash value generated by action of inserting hash

getTxIdByHash(string).details: get Tx hash for the hash string uploaded to blockchain
getTxIdByHash(string).return: is the Tx hash value generated by action of inserting hash

insertHash(string,bytes).details: insertHash,insert hash into contract with bytes data

params._uploadedData: is the data being uploaded with hash value

insertHash(string,bytes).return: bool,true is successful and false is failed

isOwner().details: Returns true if the caller is the current owner.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner.     * > Note: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setMemo(string).details: set the memo to describe the objective of the contract

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

userdoc.notice: This contract will take charge of submitting base hash value to blockchain it will be inherited by other hash operating contracts
